data.title: LaGrange, GA
data.text:
About LaGrange

OUR MISSION

The City of LaGrange will satisfy our customers and citizens by providing responsive and effective services, and well-maintained public infrastructure, which will add value to our community.

VISION STATEMENT

The City of LaGrange will strive to be a community focused on maintaining its small town character and charm while encouraging quality development and sustainable growth and promoting its rich cultural heritage.

MOTTO

Leaving LaGrange better than we found it.

A CITY INSPIRED
